__e: You send her a picture of a turtle climbing out of a briefcase. Then quickly write, "Whoops, sorry, wrong person."
I can't help you--- oops.I'm sorry,mom!
We took your son out, got him shitfaced and totally ruined his future.
Oops, I think I did that to you, too.
How about the "Oops, I didn't see you there"?
You have all these rules and you don't tell me what they are until, whoops, I've broken one.
Whoops, I think I got gas from dinner.
Up my arse? That's it then ...
You mean, "Oops, I stuck a piece of metal through this tiny hole and pushed with all my might"?
